Effect / Reminder Text: Destroy one target Command on the battlefield.
Sacrifice this Mecha: Cancel one target Mecha. (When a player tries to plays a Mecha, you may immediately sacrifice this Mecha to prevent and discard it.)
Provides 1u (1 unit of bandwidth. Play only one Tower card each turn). Adjacent Mechas  you control gain Pierce (Those units ignore Armour counters when attacking).
All Non-Basic Towers lose all abilities, except this ability (Non-Basic towers no longer provide bandwidth).
Play this Command on the battlefield. At the beginning of each player's turn, Mechas that player controls that are on or adjacent to this Command gain 1 durability counter.
